subject: Re: [junit] Unit 4.0 release candidate 2 Test ordering
msgSnippet: ... All I want with Dependancy is run test x before all the tests that depend on it. If test x passes then run the other tests in any order. If test x fails
messageBody:
On 1/20/06, Robert Lucente <rlucente@...> wrote:
>
> 2) Run these x tests in this y order and stop as soon as you hit the first
> failure.


All I want with Dependancy is run test x before all the tests that depend on
it. If test x passes then run the other tests in any order. If test x fails
then don't run those tests. I believe this is called partial ordering.

Mark
